member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether debug messages should be shown.

member.name: P:ScpSwap.Config.RequestTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration, in seconds, before a swap request gets automatically deleted.

member.name: P:ScpSwap.Config.SwapTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration, in seconds, after the round starts that swap requests can be sent.

member.name: P:ScpSwap.Config.AllowNewScps
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a player can switch to a class if there is nobody playing as it.

member.name: P:ScpSwap.Config.BlacklistedScps
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of roles blacklisted from being swapped to.

member.name: P:ScpSwap.Config.ZombieSwapping
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether zombies should be able to swap to other SCPs.

member.name: P:ScpSwap.Config.ZombieSwappingDisallowMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets the message to display to the players when they are a zombie and trying to swap.

member.name: P:ScpSwap.Config.BlacklistedNames
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of the names of custom scps blacklisted from being swapped to. This must match the name the developer integrated the SCP into this plugin's API with.
